REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2559 reute r f BC-REICHHOLD-<RCI>-RAISE 03-19 0068

TEXT.TITLE: REICHHOLD <RCI> RAISES SOME MATERIALS PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Reichhold Chemicals Inc said its emulsion polymers division increased by nine cts per dry pound the prices of all styrene-butadiene and polystyrene latexes, effective May 1. It said the increase is in addition to recently announced increases and applies to carpet, paper, nonwovens, textiles, adhesives and other specialty end uses. Reuter
